title: [Large-Scale] Workshop for Developing Digital Competencies to Enhance Blended Learning Readiness

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Usage Experience and Elementary Science Curriculum Instruction Experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening blended learning design competencies for elementary science teachers in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Participants can propose strategies for utilizing at least three digital tools for blended learning environment design
Participants can develop one digital science textbook using only mobile devices
Participants can achieve a self-assessment score of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) in at least four out of five blended learning readiness scale items

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
